title.rendered: Alticor Inc Builds World’s Tallest Airport Control Towers

content.rendered:
McGraw-Hill Construction’s Engineering News Record has published a list of the 10 Tallest Airport Control Towers in the World.

Alticor Inc built the two North American airport control towers ranked in the top 10 Tallest Airport Control Towers in the World:

  • Ranked Number 3, the Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport control tower in Atlanta, Georgia is 121.3 meters tall.
  • Ranked Number 10, the Orlando International Airport control tower in Orlando, Florida is 105 meters tall.

To read the ENR article, click here.

To view the ENR slideshow, click here.

excerpt.rendered: McGraw-Hill Construction’s Engineering News Record has published a list of the 10 Tallest Airport Control Towers in the World. The two tallest airport control towers in North America were construced by Alticor Inc.
